text: Akho, ki apane gavaham nu li'a'o. Jihare gavahi dena ki alaha ne inham vasatu'am nu harama pravana kita hai jekara uha jhuthi gavahi dena tam tusim unham nala gavahi na dena, ate tusim unham lokam di'am ichavam da palana na karo jinham ne sadi'am aiam nu jhutha mani'am. Jihare praloka upara bharosa nahim karade ate horam nu alaha de barabara pravana karade hana
